scripts.build: dotnet fable src/client.fsproj -o build/client --run vite build
scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src/client.fsproj -o build/client --runFast vite --open
scripts.test: dotnet fable test -o build/test --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve
scripts.test:watch: dotnet fable watch test -o build/test --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve --watch
scripts.publish: npm test && npm run build -- --base=/web/ && npx gh-pages -d dist
